title: 11 Ideas for AI x Crypto

rawLines.text: Welcome to Web 3 with A16Z Crypto, your
guide to the future of the internet. I'm
Robert Hackett. Today's episode is a
special one. It's a roundt on some of

builders, researchers, and dealmakers

question. How will these two powerful

Roner makes the case for giving AI
agents universal identities. Then,
research partner Scott Commoners

levels and layers of rich context.
You'll also hear from deal partners Liz
Harky on AI monetization models. Carow
Woo on the next evolution of web
crawlers. Jay Drain on proving
personhood online. And finally, security

turns internet advertising models on

AI crypto crossovers package, which you

legal, or tax advice. Please see
a6z.com/disclosures
